oracle.iam.identity.icf.connector.openfire.security

Class Secret

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.iam.identity.icf.connector.openfire.security.Secret

  • public class Secret
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for generating randomized string to exchange with relying parties.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
